<text>

		<word type="DT">The</word>
		<word type="RB">really</word>

		<word type="NN">thing</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">about</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="JJ">middle</word>
			<word type="NN">age</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="VBZ">is</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="NP">
		<word type="DT">the</word>
		<word type="NN">knowledge</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">that</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="PRP">you</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="VP">
		<word type="MD">'ll</word>
		<word type="VB">grow</word>
	</chunk>
	<chunk type="PNP">
		<chunk type="PP">
			<word type="IN">out</word>
			<word type="IN">of</word>
		</chunk>
		<chunk type="NP">
			<word type="PRP">it</word>
		</chunk>
	</chunk>
	<chink>
		<word type=".">.</word>
	</chink>
</sentence>
</text>,"0","0"
